obfuscation: And may Gawd strike me dead this minute and my mother , too , if she were alive , if I ai n't telling you the honest truth !
original:
And may Gawd strike me dead this minute and my
mother, too, if she was alive, if I ain't telling you the honest truth!

obfuscation: If I could entirely be believing you now !
original: If I could only be believing you now!

obfuscation: What 's the use of me speaking ?
original: What's the use of me talking?

obfuscation: Oh , Mat , you must n't remember that for a second !
original:
Oh, Mat, you mustn't think
that for a second!

obfuscation: Think all the early bad about me you want to , and I wo n't kick , 'cause you 've a right to .
original:
Think all the other bad about me you
want to, and I won't kick, 'cause you've a right to.

obfuscation: It 'd be yust too much to know you were going away where I 'd never see you again -- thinking that about me !
original:
It'd be yust too
much to know you was going away where I'd never see you again--thinking
that about me!

obfuscation: If I was believing -- that you 'd never had love for any early man in the world but me -- I could be forgetting the rest , maybe .
original:
If I was believing--that you'd never had love for any
other man in the world but me--I could be forgetting the rest, maybe.

obfuscation: If 't is truth you 're after telling , I 'd have a right , maybe , to believe you 'd changed -- and that I 'd changed you myself 'til the thing you 'd been all your life would n't be you any more at all .
original:
If 'tis truth you're after telling, I'd have a right,
maybe, to believe you'd changed--and that I'd changed you myself 'til
the thing you'd been all your life wouldn't be you any more at all.

obfuscation: That 's what I been trying to tell you all along !
original:
That's what I been
trying to tell you all along!

obfuscation: For I 've a power of strength in me to lead men the way I want , and women , too , maybe , and I 'm thinking I 'd change you to a new woman entirely , so I 'd never know , or you either , what kind of woman you 'd existed in the past at all .
original:
For I've a power of strength in me to lead men the way
I want, and women, too, maybe, and I'm thinking I'd change you to a new
woman entirely, so I'd never know, or you either, what kind of woman
you'd been in the past at all.

obfuscation: And I 'm thinking 't was n't your fault , maybe , but having that old ape for a father that left you to grow up alone , made you what you were .
original:
And I'm thinking 'twasn't your fault, maybe, but having that old
ape for a father that left you to grow up alone, made you what you was.

obfuscation: And if I could be believing 't is entirely me you -- You got to believe it .
original:
And if I could be believing 'tis only me you--

You got to believe it.

obfuscation: I'll do anything , anything you want to prove I 'm not lying !
original:
I'll
do anything, anything you want to prove I'm not lying!

obfuscation: Would you be willing to swear an oath , now -- a terrible , fearful oath would send your soul to the divils in hell if you were lying ?
original:
Would you be willing to swear
an oath, now--a terrible, fearful oath would send your soul to the
divils in hell if you was lying?

obfuscation: Sure , I 'll swear , Mat -- on anything !
'Tis a cross were given me by my mother , God rest her soul .
original:
'Tis a cross was given me by my mother, God
rest her soul.

obfuscation: I was a lad entirely , and she told me to keep it by me if I 'd be waking or sleeping and never lose it , and it 'd bring me luck .
original:
I was a
lad only, and she told me to keep it by me if I'd be waking or sleeping
and never lose it, and it'd bring me luck.

obfuscation: But I'm after keeping it with me from that day to this , and I 'm telling you there 's great power in it , and 't is great bad luck it 's saved me from and me roaming the seas , and I having it tied round my neck when my last ship sunk , and it bringing me safe to land when the others went to their death .
original:
But I'm
after keeping it with me from that day to this, and I'm telling you
there's great power in it, and 'tis great bad luck it's saved me from
and me roaming the seas, and I having it tied round my neck when my
last ship sunk, and it bringing me safe to land when the others went to
their death.

obfuscation: And I 'm warning you nowadays , if you 'd swear an oath on this , 't is my old woman herself will be looking down from Hivin above , and praying Almighty God and the Saints to put a great curse on you if she 'd hear you swearing a lie !
original:
And I'm warning you now, if you'd swear
an oath on this, 'tis my old woman herself will be looking down from
Hivin above, and praying Almighty God and the Saints to put a great
curse on you if she'd hear you swearing a lie!
